00049 CoinSolver::~CoinSolver() {
00050         #ifdef DEBUG
00051         cout << "inside CoinSolver destructor" << endl;
00052         #endif

00064 void CoinSolver::solve() throw (ErrorClass) {
00065         try{
00066         OSiLReader *osilreader = NULL;
00067         osresult = new OSResult();
00068                 if(osil.length() == 0 && osinstance == NULL) throw ErrorClass("there is no instance");
00069                 clock_t start, finish;
00070                 double duration;
00071                 start = clock();
00072                 if(osinstance == NULL){
00073                         osilreader = new OSiLReader();
00074                         osinstance = osilreader->readOSiL( &osil);
00075                 }
00076                                 finish = clock();
00077                 duration = (double) (finish - start) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00078                 cout << "Parsing took (seconds): "<< duration << endl;
00079                         cout << "Start Solve with a Coin Solver" << endl;
00080                 // get the type of solver requested from OSoL string
00081                 bool solverIsDefined = false;
00082                 if( sSolverName.find("clp") != std::string::npos){
00083                         if( (osinstance->getNumberOfNonlinearExpressions() > 0)
00084                                 || (osinstance->getNumberOfQuadraticTerms() > 0) 
00085                                 || (osinstance->getNumberOfIntegerVariables() > 0)
00086                                 || (osinstance->getNumberOfBinaryVariables() > 0) ) throw ErrorClass( "Clp cannot do nonlinear or quadratic or integer");
00087                         solverIsDefined = true;
00088                         m_OsiSolver = new OsiClpSolverInterface();
00089                 }
00090                 else{
00091                         if( sSolverName.find("vol") != std::string::npos){
00092                                 if( (osinstance->getNumberOfNonlinearExpressions() > 0)
00093                                         || (osinstance->getNumberOfQuadraticTerms() > 0) ) throw ErrorClass( "Vol cannot do nonlinear or quadratic");
00094                                 solverIsDefined = true;
00095                                 m_OsiSolver = new OsiVolSolverInterface();
00096                         }
00097                         else{
00098                                 if( sSolverName.find( "cplex") != std::string::npos){
00099                                         #ifdef COIN_HAS_CPX
00100                                         if( (osinstance->getNumberOfNonlinearExpressions() > 0)
00101                                                 || (osinstance->getNumberOfQuadraticTerms() > 0) ) throw ErrorClass( "Cplex cannot do nonlinear or quadratic");
00102                                         solverIsDefined = true;
00103                                         m_OsiSolver = new OsiCpxSolverInterface();
00104                                         #endif
00105                                 }
00106                                 else{
00107                                         if(sSolverName.find( "glpk") != std::string::npos){
00108                                                 #ifdef COIN_HAS_GLPK
00109                                                 if( (osinstance->getNumberOfNonlinearExpressions() > 0)
00110                                                         || (osinstance->getNumberOfQuadraticTerms() > 0) ) throw ErrorClass( "Glpk cannot do nonlinear or quadratic");
00111                                                 solverIsDefined = true;
00112                                                 m_OsiSolver = new OsiGlpkSolverInterface();
00113                                                 #endif
00114                                         }
00115                                         else{
00116                                                 if(sSolverName.find( "dylp") != std::string::npos){
00117                                                 std::cout << "HERE IS GAIL" << std::endl;
00118                                                         #ifdef COIN_HAS_DYLP
00119                                                         if( (osinstance->getNumberOfNonlinearExpressions() > 0)
00120                                                                 || (osinstance->getNumberOfQuadraticTerms() > 0)  ) {
00121                                                                 std::cout << "HERE IS GAIL 00000" << std::endl;
00122                                                                 throw ErrorClass( "DyLP cannot do nonlinear or quadratic");
00123                                                                 }
00124                                                         if( (osinstance->getNumberOfIntegerVariables() > 0)
00125                                                                 || (osinstance->getNumberOfBinaryVariables() > 0)  ) throw ErrorClass( "DyLP cannot do integer programming");
00126                                                         solverIsDefined = true;
00127                                                         std::cout << "HERE IS GAIL 2" << std::endl;
00128                                                         m_OsiSolver = new OsiDylpSolverInterface();
00129                                                         std::cout << "HERE IS GAIL 3" << std::endl;
00130                                                         #endif
00131                                                 }
00132                                                 else{
00133                                                         if( sSolverName.find( "symphony") != std::string::npos) {
00134                                                                 #ifdef COIN_HAS_SYMPHONY
00135                                                                 if( (osinstance->getNumberOfNonlinearExpressions() > 0)
00136                                                                         || (osinstance->getNumberOfQuadraticTerms() > 0)  ) throw ErrorClass( "SYMPHONY cannot do nonlinear or quadratic");
00137                                                                 solverIsDefined = true;
00138                                                                 m_OsiSolver = new OsiSymSolverInterface();
00139                                                                 #endif
00140                                                         }
00141                                                         else{
00142                                                                 // default solver is CBC
00143                                                                 if( (osinstance->getNumberOfNonlinearExpressions() > 0)
00144                                                                         || (osinstance->getNumberOfQuadraticTerms() > 0) ) throw ErrorClass( "Cbc cannot do nonlinear or quadratic");
00145                                                                 solverIsDefined = true;
00146                                                                 m_OsiSolver = new OsiCbcSolverInterface();
00147                                                         }
00148                                                 }
00149                                         }
00150                                 }
00151                         }
00152                 }
00153                 //
00154                 //
00155                 if(solverIsDefined == false) throw ErrorClass("a supported solver was not defined");
00156                 if(osinstance->getConstraintNumber() <= 0)throw ErrorClass("Coin solver Needs Constraints");
00157                 if(osinstance->getVariableNumber() <= 0)throw ErrorClass("Coin solver requires decision variables");
00158                 if(osinstance->getObjectiveNumber() <= 0) throw ErrorClass("Coin solver needs an objective function");
00159                 if(osinstance->getLinearConstraintCoefficientNumber() <= 0) throw ErrorClass("Coin solver needs linear constraints");
00160                 if(!setCoinPackedMatrix() ) throw ErrorClass("Problem generating coin packed matrix");
00161                 //dataEchoCheck();
00162                 if(optimize() != true) throw ErrorClass("there was an error trying to optimize the problem");
00163                 delete osilreader;
00164                 osilreader = NULL;
00165         }// end solve
00166         catch(const ErrorClass& eclass){
00167                 std::cout << "THERE IS AN ERROR" << std::endl;
00168                 osresult->setGeneralMessage( eclass.errormsg);
00169                 osresult->setGeneralStatusType( "error");
00170                 osrl = osrlwriter->writeOSrL( osresult);
00171                 throw ErrorClass( osrl) ;
00172         }                               
00173 }//end solve()

00177 bool CoinSolver::setCoinPackedMatrix(){
00178         bool columnMajor = osinstance->getLinearConstraintCoefficientMajor();
00179         try{
00180                 int maxGap = 0;
00181                 m_CoinPackedMatrix = new CoinPackedMatrix(
00182                         columnMajor, //Column or Row Major
00183                         columnMajor? osinstance->getConstraintNumber() : osinstance->getVariableNumber(), //Minor Dimension
00184                         columnMajor? osinstance->getVariableNumber() : osinstance->getConstraintNumber(), //Major Dimension
00185                         osinstance->getLinearConstraintCoefficientNumber(), //Number of nonzeroes
00186                         columnMajor? osinstance->getLinearConstraintCoefficientsInColumnMajor()->values : osinstance->getLinearConstraintCoefficientsInRowMajor()->values, //Pointer to matrix nonzeroes
00187                         columnMajor? osinstance->getLinearConstraintCoefficientsInColumnMajor()->indexes : osinstance->getLinearConstraintCoefficientsInRowMajor()->indexes, //Pointer to start of minor dimension indexes -- change to allow for row storage
00188                         columnMajor? osinstance->getLinearConstraintCoefficientsInColumnMajor()->starts : osinstance->getLinearConstraintCoefficientsInRowMajor()->starts, //Pointers to start of columns.
00189                         0,   0, maxGap ); 
00190 
00191                 return true;
00192         }
00193         catch(const ErrorClass& eclass){
00194                 osresult->setGeneralMessage( eclass.errormsg);
00195                 osresult->setGeneralStatusType( "error");
00196                 osrl = osrlwriter->writeOSrL( osresult);
00197                 throw ;
00198         }
00199 } // end setCoinPackedMatrix

00201 bool CoinSolver::optimize()
00202 {
00203         double *x = NULL;
00204         double *y = NULL;
00205         double *z = NULL;
00206         std::string *rcost = NULL;
00207         // resultHeader infomration
00208         if(osresult->setServiceName("Solved with Coin Solver: " + sSolverName) != true)
00209                 throw ErrorClass("OSResult error: setServiceName");
00210         if(osresult->setInstanceName(  osinstance->getInstanceName()) != true)
00211                 throw ErrorClass("OSResult error: setInstanceName");
00212         //if(osresult->setJobID( osresultdata->jobID) != true)
00213         //      throw ErrorClass("OSResult error: setJobID");
00214         //if(osresult->setGeneralMessage( osresultdata->message) != true)
00215         //      throw ErrorClass("OSResult error: setGeneralMessage");
00216         // set basic problem parameters
00217         if(osresult->setVariableNumber( osinstance->getVariableNumber()) != true)
00218                 throw ErrorClass("OSResult error: setVariableNumer");
00219         if(osresult->setObjectiveNumber( 1) != true)
00220                 throw ErrorClass("OSResult error: setObjectiveNumber");
00221         if(osresult->setConstraintNumber( osinstance->getConstraintNumber()) != true)
00222                 throw ErrorClass("OSResult error: setConstraintNumber");
00223         if(osresult->setSolutionNumber(  1) != true)
00224                 throw ErrorClass("OSResult error: setSolutionNumer");   
00225         //
00226         int i = 0;
00227         try{
00228                 m_OsiSolver->loadProblem(*m_CoinPackedMatrix, osinstance->getVariableLowerBounds(), 
00229                                         osinstance->getVariableUpperBounds(),  
00230                                         osinstance->getDenseObjectiveCoefficients()[0], 
00231                                         osinstance->getConstraintLowerBounds(), osinstance->getConstraintUpperBounds());
00232                 
00233                 // the code below causes a memory problem because it does not create a new copy in memory
00234                 //m_OsiSolver->assignProblem(m_CoinPackedMatrix, osinstance->getVariableLowerBounds(), 
00235                 //                      osinstance->getVariableUpperBounds(),  
00236                 //                      osinstance->getDenseObjectiveCoefficients()[0], 
00237                 //                      osinstance->getConstraintLowerBounds(), osinstance->getConstraintUpperBounds());
00238                 if(osinstance->getObjectiveNumber() == 0) throw ErrorClass("there is no objective function");
00239 
00240                 //      
00241                 if( osinstance->getObjectiveMaxOrMins()[0] == "min") m_OsiSolver->setObjSense(1.0);
00242                 else m_OsiSolver->setObjSense(-1.0);
00243                 m_OsiSolver->setDblParam(OsiObjOffset, osinstance->getObjectiveConstants()[0]);
00244                 //
00245                 // set the integer variables
00246                 int *intIndex;
00247                 int k = 0;
00248                 char *varType;
00249                 int numOfIntVars = osinstance->getNumberOfIntegerVariables() + osinstance->getNumberOfBinaryVariables();
00250                 intIndex = new int[ numOfIntVars];
00251                 varType = osinstance->getVariableTypes();
00252                 for(i = 0; i < osinstance->getVariableNumber(); i++){
00253                         if( (varType[i] == 'B') || (varType[i]) == 'I' ) {
00254                                 intIndex[k++] = i;
00255                         }
00256                 }
00257                 m_OsiSolver->setInteger( intIndex,  numOfIntVars);
00258                 // try to catch Coin Solver errors
00259                 try{
00260                         if(numOfIntVars > 0){
00261                                 m_OsiSolver->branchAndBound();
00262                         }
00263                         else{
00264                                 m_OsiSolver->initialSolve();
00265                                 cout << "DONE WITH INITIAL SOLVE" << endl;
00266                         }
00267                 }
00268                 catch(CoinError e){
00269                         std::string errmsg;
00270                         errmsg = "Coin Solver Error: " + e.message() + "\n" + " see method "  
00271                                 + e.methodName() + " in class " + e.className();
00272                         throw ErrorClass( errmsg );
00273                 }
00274                 int solIdx = 0;
00275                 std::string description = "";
00276                 osresult->setGeneralStatusType("success");
00277                 if (m_OsiSolver->isProvenOptimal() == true){
00278                         osresult->setSolutionStatus(solIdx, "optimal", description);
00279                         /* Retrieve the solution */
00280                         x = new double[osinstance->getVariableNumber() ];
00281                         y = new double[osinstance->getConstraintNumber() ];
00282                         z = new double[1];
00283                         rcost = new std::string[ osinstance->getVariableNumber()];
00284                         //
00285                         *(z + 0)  =  m_OsiSolver->getObjValue();
00286                         osresult->setObjectiveValues(solIdx, z);
00287                         for(i=0; i < osinstance->getVariableNumber(); i++){
00288                                 *(x + i) = m_OsiSolver->getColSolution()[i];
00289                         }
00290                         osresult->setPrimalVariableValues(solIdx, x);
00291                         // Symphony does not get dual prices
00292                         if( sSolverName.find( "symphony") == std::string::npos){
00293                                 for(i=0; i <  osinstance->getConstraintNumber(); i++){\
00294                                         *(y + i) = m_OsiSolver->getRowPrice()[ i];
00295                                 }
00296                                 osresult->setDualVariableValues(solIdx, y);
00297                         }
00298                         //
00299                         //
00300                         // now put the reduced costs into the osrl
00301                         // Symphony does not get reduced costs
00302                         if( sSolverName.find( "symphony") == std::string::npos){
00303                                 int numberOfOtherVariableResult = 1;
00304                                 int otherIdx = 0;
00305                                 // first set the number of Other Variable Results
00306                                 osresult->setNumberOfOtherVariableResult(solIdx, numberOfOtherVariableResult);
00307                                 ostringstream outStr;
00308                                 int numberOfVar =  osinstance->getVariableNumber();
00309                                 for(i=0; i < numberOfVar; i++){
00310                                         outStr << m_OsiSolver->getReducedCost()[ i]; 
00311                                         rcost[ i] = outStr.str();
00312                                         outStr.str("");
00313                                 }
00314                                 osresult->setAnOtherVariableResult(solIdx, otherIdx, "reduced costs", "the variable reduced costs", rcost);                     
00315                                 // end of settiing reduced costs
00316                         }                                       
00317                 }
00318                 else{ 
00319                         if(m_OsiSolver->isProvenPrimalInfeasible() == true) 
00320                                 osresult->setSolutionStatus(solIdx, "infeasible", description);
00321                         else
00322                                 if(m_OsiSolver->isProvenDualInfeasible() == true) 
00323                                         osresult->setSolutionStatus(solIdx, "dualinfeasible", description);
00324                                 else
00325                                         osresult->setSolutionStatus(solIdx, "other", description);
00326                 }
00327                 osrl = osrlwriter->writeOSrL( osresult);
00328                 if(osinstance->getVariableNumber() > 0) delete[] x;
00329                 x = NULL;
00330                 if(osinstance->getConstraintNumber()) delete[] y;
00331                 y = NULL;
00332                 delete[] z;     
00333                 z = NULL;
00334                 if(osinstance->getVariableNumber() > 0) delete[] rcost;
00335                 return true;
00336         }
00337         catch(const ErrorClass& eclass){
00338                 osresult->setGeneralMessage( eclass.errormsg);
00339                 osresult->setGeneralStatusType( "error");
00340                 osrl = osrlwriter->writeOSrL( osresult);
00341                 throw ;
00342         }
00343 } // end optimize

00345 std::string CoinSolver::getCoinSolverType(std::string lcl_osol){
00346 // this is deprecated, but keep it around
00347         try{
00348                 if( lcl_osol.find( "clp") != std::string::npos){
00349                         return "coin_solver_glpk";
00350                 }
00351                 else{
00352                         if( lcl_osol.find( "cbc") != std::string::npos){
00353                                 return "coin_solver_cpx";
00354                         }
00355                         else{
00356                                 if( lcl_osol.find( "cpx") != std::string::npos){
00357                                         return "coin_solver_clp";
00358                                 }
00359                                 else{
00360                                         if(lcl_osol.find( "glpk") != std::string::npos){
00361                                                 return "";
00362                                         }
00363                                         else throw ErrorClass("a supported solver was not defined");
00364                                 }
00365                         }
00366                 }
00367         }
00368         catch(const ErrorClass& eclass){
00369                 osresult->setGeneralMessage( eclass.errormsg);
00370                 osresult->setGeneralStatusType( "error");
00371                 osrl = osrlwriter->writeOSrL( osresult);
00372                 throw ;
00373         }
00374 } // end getCoinSolverType

00376 void CoinSolver::dataEchoCheck(){
00377         int i;
00378         // print out problem parameters
00379         cout << "This is problem:  " << osinstance->getInstanceName() << endl;
00380         cout << "The problem source is:  " << osinstance->getInstanceSource() << endl;
00381         cout << "The problem description is:  " << osinstance->getInstanceDescription() << endl;
00382         cout << "number of variables = " << osinstance->getVariableNumber() << endl;
00383         cout << "number of Rows = " << osinstance->getConstraintNumber() << endl;
00384 
00385         // print out the variable information
00386         if(osinstance->getVariableNumber() > 0){
00387                 for(i = 0; i < osinstance->getVariableNumber(); i++){
00388                         if(osinstance->getVariableNames() != NULL) cout << "variable Names  " << osinstance->getVariableNames()[ i]  << endl;
00389                         if(osinstance->getVariableTypes() != NULL) cout << "variable Types  " << osinstance->getVariableTypes()[ i]  << endl;
00390                         if(osinstance->getVariableLowerBounds() != NULL) cout << "variable Lower Bounds  " << osinstance->getVariableLowerBounds()[ i]  << endl;
00391                         if(osinstance->getVariableUpperBounds() != NULL) cout << "variable Upper Bounds  " <<  osinstance->getVariableUpperBounds()[i] << endl;
00392                 }
00393         }
00394         
00395         // print out objective function information
00396         if(osinstance->getVariableNumber() > 0 || osinstance->instanceData->objectives->obj != NULL || osinstance->instanceData->objectives->numberOfObjectives > 0){
00397                 if( osinstance->getObjectiveMaxOrMins()[0] == "min")  cout <<  "problem is a minimization" << endl;
00398                 else cout <<  "problem is a maximization" << endl;
00399                 for(i = 0; i < osinstance->getVariableNumber(); i++){
00400                         cout << "OBJ COEFFICIENT =  " <<  osinstance->getDenseObjectiveCoefficients()[0][i] << endl;
00401                 }
00402         }
00403         // print out constraint information
00404         if(osinstance->getConstraintNumber() > 0){
00405                 for(i = 0; i < osinstance->getConstraintNumber(); i++){
00406                         if(osinstance->getConstraintNames() != NULL) cout << "row name = " << osinstance->getConstraintNames()[i] <<  endl;
00407                         if(osinstance->getConstraintLowerBounds() != NULL) cout << "row lower bound = " << osinstance->getConstraintLowerBounds()[i] <<  endl;
00408                         if(osinstance->getConstraintUpperBounds() != NULL) cout << "row upper bound = " << osinstance->getConstraintUpperBounds()[i] <<  endl; 
00409                 }
00410         }
00411         
00412         // print out linear constraint data
00413         if(m_CoinPackedMatrix != NULL) m_CoinPackedMatrix->dumpMatrix();
00414 } // end dataEchoCheck
